column5: Yes today at Sobey's Lake Erie Yellow Perch $4.99 LB. at Queenston Rd. Hamilton East I couldn't belive it.
Wow, selling for $10 a lb, here in Woodstock.
Great price! Still rather catch em myself though( prolly only costs me about 10 times that much)
Catching them is fun...  Cleaning them, well not so much...
truck, boat, gas, ramp fees, gear, coffees, lunch, cocktails, bait....  yep 4.99/lb pretty good!
